name: Villains inside
description:
Villains Inside is a fast-paced action game  where you plays as a virus that tries to enter, infect, and replicate in a human's body that sets & inspired by the recent event of the COVID-19 pandemic. During your playthrough, you will be met by various resistances made by the host's immunity system trying to fight back your viruses that you brought. The story of the game does not follow a simple storyline where it's about good vs. evil or vice versa, but instead it teaches about how a virus existency could infect and leave many impacts on a human's body.

Fight your way againt's host's immunity system with variety of skillsets to choose, upgrade, and use againts your enemies. Meet various virus allies as you go on your way to finalize your infection into a host's body. Complete over 4 main chapters and a total of 23 sub-chapters in the game and be the dominant force that could crush the immunities resistances.
